Option.Name: Icon: Green outer edge with an arrow in the center

targetMarkerType.Wiki: Type of marker (FE) to display at target position

extendWireActionDistance.Wiki: If a value other than 0 is set, the wire action (action possible/recognition) distance will be extended by that distance. It is assumed that it will be used on a limited basis as it will be searched regardless of the grid.

recognitionAngleUp.Wiki: With the reference direction of the wire edge as the front, only characters within this angle above can perform wire actions.

recognitionAngleDown.Wiki: With the reference direction of the wire edge as the front, only characters within this angle below can perform wire actions.

recognitionAngleLeft.Wiki: Only characters within this angle on the left side can perform wire actions when the reference direction of the wire edge is the front.

recognitionAngleRight.Wiki: Only characters within this angle on the right side can perform wire actions when the reference direction of the wire edge is the front.

chrPhysicsHomingIdOffset.Wiki: Offset the character physical homing parameter ID with this value. Use this when you want to shift the homing target position for each wire edge.
